title: I havent got the icon for 10 years
body: I have received the gift from riot for my mystery skin but I haven't received my icon and I'm am starting to think that I am not getting it since it hasn't came already... Please someone at riot help!

replies.body: There are many accounts to gift, so it's going to be a bit of time for everyone to get their goods.  Stay up to date on our progress so far through the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Patience!
I have already received my mystery gift but I haven't received the icon I thought that was supposed to come first?
